metadata.title: CVE-2022-3064 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Parsing malicious or large YAML documents can consume excessive amounts ofCPU or memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3064` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-gopkg-yaml.v2-dev - 0.0+git20170407.0.cd8b52f-1ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-yaml.v2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.0+git20170407.0.cd8b52f-1ubuntu2+esm1').
singularity-container package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webhook package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
